trans-unit.source: Marks an object that can propagate outside of an <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 외부에 전파할 수 있는 개체 표시는 <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref> 에 <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: When a remote method call is made to an object in another <xref:System.AppDomain>, the current <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> class generates a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext> that travels along with the call to the remote location.
trans-unit.target: 다른 개체에 원격 메서드 호출이 수행 때 <xref:System.AppDomain>, 현재 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext>클래스를 생성 한 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext>원격 위치에 대 한 호출 함께 전달 되.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: Only objects that expose the ILogicalThreadAffinative interface and are stored in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> are propagated outside the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext>전파 되는 <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> 외부</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.CallContext> 에 저장 된를 ILogicalThreadAffinative 인터페이스를 공개 하는 개체

trans-unit.source: Objects that do not support this interface are not transmitted in <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext> instances with remote method calls.
trans-unit.target: 이 인터페이스를 지원 하지 않는 개체에 전송 되지 않은 <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext>원격 메서드 호출을 사용 하 여 인스턴스.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.LogicalCallContext>
